Alesco

Integrated solution provider

Company

Founded in 2004, we are a general contractor and service provider in the fields of oil & gas, power & petrochemical industry, electrical generators and elevators, photovoltaic & firefighting systems active throughout all of Libya.

As a fast expanding company, depending on its staff’s expertise and knowledge, we aim to please our clients by delivering top quality projects in optimal durations.

We are involved in multiple industries and we provide various services, facing challenging projects under the most critical environmental and logistical conditions in remote locations, combining advanced methods and technologies.

vision

To achieve substantial and continuous growth while delivering world-class solutions for end users.

MISSION

To provide outstanding service performance and dependable supplies to our clients within all our operating markets.

VALUES

  • Reliability
  • Integrity
  • Safety
  • Performance

Industries

ALESCO core business is divided into two main chapters including the construction, operation, commissioning and maintenance of upstream, midstream and downstream oil & gas facilities, power plant, turbines & petrochemical installations. we offer integrated solutions for turnkey projects including pipe plants & pipelines, oil storage tanks, rotating equipment, ...

ALESCO provides the engineering, procurement, construction and installation of complex systems such as firefighting systems, photovoltaic compounds, electrical generators (official commercial representative of WFM GENERATORS and electrical elevators (official commercial representative of DOPPLER ELEVATORS in an optimal and safe operational conditions, with the consideration of minimal cost / maximum availability politic.

ENGINEERING PROCUREMENT construction INSTALLATION
POWER GENERATION PLANTS & TURBINES
PETROCHEMICAL & CHEMICAL INDUSTRIES

ELECTRICAL GENERATORS
ELECTRICAL ELEVATORS

HVAC systems

Services

engineering

Advanced design and engineering capabilities for the Industry. Starting from feasibility studies, FEED & basic engineering up to detailed engineering.

procurement

Our activities are managed through planning & integrity, vendor qualification and monitoring of material and equipment logistics.

construction

Fabrication and construction of large and complex plants and metallic structures for the offshore and onshore Industries with optimal Safety and Quality regulations.

installation

Turnkey projects delivery on a full EPCI basis: maritime transportation, onshore & offshore equipment installation and start-up.

commission

Assurance of old and new projects design, installation, testing, operation, and maintenance according to the operational requirements of the client.

manpower supply

Technical assistance and supply of qualified manpower suck as engineers, technicians, skilled and unskilled workers, specialists from different nationalities and in different fields.
